propDescriptions.autoComplete: If true, the portion of the selected suggestion that has not been typed by the user, known as the completion string, appears inline after the input cursor in the textbox. The inline completion string is visually highlighted and has a selected state.
propDescriptions.autoHighlight: If true, the first option is automatically highlighted.
propDescriptions.autoSelect: If true, the selected option becomes the value of the input when the Autocomplete loses focus unless the user chooses a different option or changes the character string in the input.
propDescriptions.blurOnSelect: Control if the input should be blurred when an option is selected: - false the input is not blurred. - true the input is always blurred. - touch the input is blurred after a touch event. - mouse the input is blurred after a mouse event.
propDescriptions.ChipProps: Props applied to the Chip element.
propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.clearIcon: The icon to display in place of the default clear icon.
propDescriptions.clearOnBlur: If true, the input's text is cleared on blur if no value is selected. Set to true if you want to help the user enter a new value. Set to false if you want to help the user resume his search.
propDescriptions.clearOnEscape: If true, clear all values when the user presses escape and the popup is closed.
propDescriptions.clearText: Override the default text for the clear icon button. For localization purposes, you can use the provided translations.
propDescriptions.closeText: Override the default text for the close popup icon button. For localization purposes, you can use the provided translations.
propDescriptions.defaultValue: The default input value. Use when the component is not controlled.
propDescriptions.disableClearable: If true, the input can't be cleared.
propDescriptions.disableCloseOnSelect: If true, the popup won't close when a value is selected.
propDescriptions.disabledItemsFocusable: If true, will allow focus on disabled items.
propDescriptions.disableListWrap: If true, the list box in the popup will not wrap focus.
propDescriptions.disablePortal: The Popper content will be inside the DOM hierarchy of the parent component.
propDescriptions.filterSelectedOptions: If true, hide the selected options from the list box.
propDescriptions.forcePopupIcon: Force the visibility display of the popup icon.
propDescriptions.freeSolo: If true, the Autocomplete is free solo, meaning that the user input is not bound to provided options.
propDescriptions.fullWidth: If true, the input will take up the full width of its container.
propDescriptions.handleHomeEndKeys: If true, the component handles the "Home" and "End" keys when the popup is open. It should move focus to the first option and last option, respectively.
propDescriptions.id:
This prop is used to help implement the accessibility logic.
If you don't provide this prop. It falls back to a randomly generated id.
propDescriptions.includeInputInList: If true, the highlight can move to the input.
propDescriptions.limitTags: The maximum number of tags that will be visible when not focused. Set -1 to disable the limit.
propDescriptions.ListboxComponent: The component used to render the listbox.
propDescriptions.ListboxProps: Props applied to the Listbox element.
propDescriptions.loading: If true, the component is in a loading state.
propDescriptions.loadingText: Text to display when in a loading state. For localization purposes, you can use the provided translations.
propDescriptions.multiple: If true, value must be an array and the menu will support multiple selections.
propDescriptions.noOptionsText: Text to display when there are no options. For localization purposes, you can use the provided translations.
propDescriptions.openOnFocus: If true, the popup will open on input focus.
propDescriptions.openText: Override the default text for the open popup icon button. For localization purposes, you can use the provided translations.
propDescriptions.PaperComponent: The component used to render the body of the popup.
propDescriptions.PopperComponent: The component used to position the popup.
propDescriptions.popupIcon: The icon to display in place of the default popup icon.
propDescriptions.selectOnFocus: If true, the input's text is selected on focus. It helps the user clear the selected value.
propDescriptions.value: The value of the autocomplete. The value must have reference equality with the option in order to be selected. You can customize the equality behavior with the getOptionSelected prop.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

@media (pointer.description: Avoid double tap issue on iOS

fullWidth.description: Styles applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

focused.description: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if focused.

tag.description: Styles applied to the tag elements, e.g. the chips.

tagSizeSmall.description: Styles applied to the tag elements, e.g. the chips if {{conditions}}.

hasPopupIcon.description: Styles applied when the popup icon is rendered.

hasClearIcon.description: Styles applied when the clear icon is rendered.

inputRoot.description: Styles applied to the Input element.

input.description: Styles applied to the input element.

inputFocused.description: Styles applied to the input element if tag focused.

endAdornment.description: Styles applied to the endAdornment element.

clearIndicator.description: Styles applied to the clear indicator.

popupIndicator.description: Styles applied to the popup indicator.

popupIndicatorOpen.description: Styles applied to the popup indicator if the popup is open.

popper.description: Styles applied to the popper element.

popperDisablePortal.description: Styles applied to the popper element if {{conditions}}.

loading.description: Styles applied to the loading wrapper.

noOptions.description: Styles applied to the no option wrapper.

option.description: Styles applied to the option elements.

groupLabel.description: Styles applied to the group's label elements.

groupUl.description: Styles applied to the group's ul elements.
